description: Devold® Herøy consists of a lightweight and comfortable pant and shorts for men and woman. The unique Merino wool blend provides excellent breathing capabilities, high durability and good elasticity. In addition wool naturally adjusts your body temperature, an important feature for high intensity activities. Articulated knees provide increased freedom of movement and comfort. With several pockets, comfortable fit, reflective details and the ability to tighten around the ankles, Devold® Herøy is the ultimate pant for hiking.
name: Devold Heroy Merino Pants - Mens
